org.itemscript.core.gwt
Class GwtHttpConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.gwt.GwtHttpConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncGetConnector, AsyncPostConnector, AsyncPutConnector, Connector, HasSystem
public class GwtHttpConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsyncGetConnector, AsyncPutConnector, AsyncPostConnector, HasSystem

A connector for retrieving JSON values via HTTP.

This connector is associated with the http:, https:, and file: schemes in the GWT configuration.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org
